alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; DeSoto; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 6:31PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Highlands, Charlotte, DeSoto and northeastern Lee Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 631 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Southeast Arcadia to near Babcock Ranch. Movement was west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Punta Gorda, Arcadia, Lake Placid, Sylvan Shores, East Dunbar, Palmona Park, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Babcock Webb Wma, Southeast Arcadia, Babcock Ranch, Charleston Park, Olga, Venus, Charlotte County Airport, Buckingham, Nocatee, Brownville and Harbour Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; DeSoto; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
